R

RandomEvent - Class in Main
The RandomEvent Class extends the GameEnvironment Class and implements random actions on the club and its athletes throughout the game
RandomEvent() - Constructor for class Main.RandomEvent
 
removeItem(Item) - Method in class Main.Inventory
This function removes the item from the inventory
ReserveFull() - Method in class Main.Club
This function identifies if the reserve list is full or not
reserveRemoveAthlete(Athlete) - Method in class Main.Club
This function removes the respective athlete from the reserves
resetItemMarket(int) - Method in class Main.Market
This function resets the itemContents List and clears it.
resetMatches(List<Match>, int) - Method in class Main.GameEnvironment
This function resets the matches for the following week
resetPlayerMarket(int) - Method in class Main.Market
This function resets the player market when called, and generates a new list of purchasable athletes.
rest() - Method in class Main.Athlete
This function replenishes the athletes stamina to 100
runCurrentState(GameState, Club, Market, Market, Inventory, List<Match>) - Method in class Main.GameEnvironment
Gamestate controls the state of the game
runEvent(int, Club) - Method in class Main.RandomEvent
This function will randomly either increase the stats of certain athletes in the team, or the athlete will randomly leave the team
